0:
Welcome to your first day of training!.
Please move to the next objective marker.
Use the [W] [A] [S] [D] keys to move.
1:
Excelent! Next, we'll practice interacting with objects.
Open the door ahead of you by clicking on it with the mouse.
2: The loot is ahead in that suitcase. Pick it up by walking over it.
3:
The only way to know if security cameras are watching you is by using the night vision.
To activate, simply press the [SPACE] key.
4:
Now to the real fun starts!
Go to the exit!
